raw_body: SIVANANDARAJAH – S. (S. RAJAH) – Founder /​ Chairman International Education Consultancy – (IEC). Beloved husband of Mary De Silva,​ loving father of Roshan De Silva and Manjula Perera (IEC),​ father-in-law of Nalin Perera,​ grandfather of Angelo Perera,​ Denham Perera,​ Lizelle Jayawardana and Tasheeka De Silva,​ great-grandfather of Rahen. Remains lie at No. 17/​4,​ Holy Cross Avenue,​ Moratuwa for viewing from 10 a.m. on 13th July. Cortege leaves residence for Burial on 14 July at 4 p.m. at St. Joseph’s Church,​ Uyana,​ Moratuwa. May God grand eternal peace to his soul.042933
